snippet.title: Super Mario Kart Deluxe (#SMKDX) - Teaser Trailer (August 2022)
snippet.description:
Teaser trailer (August 2022) of the upcoming romhack "Super Mario Kart Deluxe" by SMKWorkshop team.
-------------------------------------------
🌟 Features of SMKDX 🌟
-------------------------------------------
⍟ Works on original hardware
⍟ 8 Additional Characters (16 Total)
    ⋆ Wario, Daisy, Bowser Jr, Kamek, 
    ⋆ Waluigi, Birdo, Dixie Kong, and Toadette
⍟ 8 Additional Track Themes (16 Total)
    ⋆ Daisy Garden, Desert Land, Hazy Cavern, Fiery Volcano, 
    ⋆ Wario Rally, Stormy Jungle, Poison Swamp, and Star Road
⍟ 6 Additional Cups (10 Total), with unique Podium Scenes
⍟ 50 Race Tracks + 10 Battle Tracks
⍟ Mirror Mode
⍟ Mission Mode, with 81 Mission Levels and Custom Bosses
⍟ Settings Menu
⍟ New Battle Modes: Shine Thief, and Gate Battle
⍟ 6 Speed Classes: 50cc, 100cc, 150cc, 200cc, 250cc, and 300cc!!
⍟ New Music
⍟ New Items
⍟ Staff Ghosts
⍟ More TBA Game Modes
⍟ Custom Credits

-------------------
🌟 Q&A 🌟
-------------------
Q: Will this game be working on Super Nintendo/Super Famicom or only on emulators?
A: Yes, as stated in the video, the romhack will be fully working on original hardware as well as emulators. Also, we envision a PAL and NTSC version of the game, eventhough our focus is on the NTSC version only atm.

Q: When will this game be released?
A: There is no release date set at the moment. We're doing our best, but this takes a huge amount of time and it's basically on our free time... When we'll have a clearer visibility on when we can hope for a release date we'll let you know. 

Q: How can I have more information about this game/remain aware of the progress?
A: Follow us (MrL314 and I) and/or SMKWorkshop team. (See at the bottom of Description for links) We publish regularly about our progress on the game.

---------------------
🌟 Music 🌟
---------------------
Music by Helynt (via GameChops)

Mario Kart ▸ Rainbow Road (Synthwave Remix) ~ Mario & Chill
https://youtu.be/7DQPgw7gxtc

Follow Helynt:
youtube.com/user/helynt1
http://soundcloud.com/helynt
http://facebook.com/iamhelynt
http://twitter.com/iamhelynt
http://helynt.bandcamp.com/

-----------------------------------------
🌟 Other MK footage 🌟
-----------------------------------------
MK64: https://youtu.be/ASWgJvuQhTA
MKSC: https://youtu.be/awF8rvh6bXc
MKDD: https://youtu.be/dV6Loo6048w
MKDS: https://youtu.be/v0_LYLcsprM
MKWii: https://youtu.be/YjNTdQHkRJY
MK7: https://youtu.be/ElKNR3WuAdQ
MK8: https://youtu.be/vEwfjxPkAdQ
MK8DX: https://youtu.be/byjxUYfdXrY

---------------------------
🌟 Follow us 🌟
---------------------------
💚MrL314💚
https://www.youtube.com/misterL314
https://twitter.com/LF_MrL314
https://www.twitch.tv/mrl314
https://www.patreon.com/MrL314

💙ScouB💙
https://www.youtube.com/scoubsmk
https://www.twitter.com/scoubsmk
https://www.twitch.tv/scoubsmk

💛SMKWorkshop team💛
https://twitter.com/SmkWorkshop
https://discord.gg/QNcKNQC

#smkdx #supermariokart #snes #romhack #retrogaming #mariokart #retro #speedrun #nintendo #supernintendo  #supermariokartdeluxe
